Description:
Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Enterprise Solution Atchitect.In this role, you will:Delivering Architecture and Solution Designs to meet business requirements, from logical architecture through to physical infrastructure architecture
Ensuring clear alignment between the Protective Security Book of Work and the functional and architecture roadmaps
Participating in Architectural Governance processes to ensure that proposed solution designs are strategically aligned to the architecture roadmaps and the Group’s Future State Architecture
Ensuring proposed solution designs utilise group approved technology and adhere to approved technology and infrastructure design patterns
Ensuring that deployed system solutions, both vendor supplied and in-house developments are appropriately hosted (Internally, Externally, Cloud, PaaS, SaaS) including the corresponding governance and relevant approval processes
Gaining insight into industry developments and trends and identifying opportunities for innovation and leveraging new technology 
Identifying and leveraging appropriate industry and HSBC defined architecture reference models and solution patterns
Providing architectural consultancy as required for the delivery of projects to ensure business objectives are achieved and regulatory and operational risks are controlled.Job Details
